name: Sylvie’s Salmon Burgers

ingredients.name: Honey Mustard or Sweet & Spicy Mustard
Herb & Garlic Dip Mix or Lemon Dilly Dip Mix

preparation: Stir potatoes with 3 Onion Dip Mix, 1 tbsp mustard, Herb & Garlic Dip mix, sea salt, black pepper, and egg.
Fold in salmon and let mixture sit for 5 min.
Divide salmon mixture into desired number of burgers. Wet hands to prevent sticking and form into patties. Wrap with plastic and chill in refrigerator for at least 1 hour, or overnight.
Lightly spray frying pan with vegetable or olive oil. Pan-fry burgers over medium heat for 5 min per side, or until heated through.
Stir mayonnaise with remaining mustard, lemon juice, capers, Lemon Dilly Dip Mix and minced garlic. Spoon over cooked burgers.

products.name: 3 Onion Dip Mix
summary: These onions won’t make you cry—they’re pure happiness in a jar! Save time (and tears) on chopping and use this blend anytime you’re looking for the robust flavour of onions, chives, and scallions. Take it way beyond the dip bowl and use 3 Onion as a sauce or seasoning for eggs, veggies, burgers, tacos, and more!

products.name: Herb & Garlic Dip Mix
summary: Classic notes of chives, parsley, & garlic.

products.name: Lemon Dilly Dip Mix
summary: Beyond being one of our most-loved kid-friendly dips – they love it for dunking chicken strips, fish bites, and veggies – Lemon Dilly is all about versatility. With loads of dill and a hint of lemon zest, it makes an utterly delicious tzatziki and spread for burgers and sandwiches, and levels up everything from salad dressing and salmon to pasta and vegetables.
